summary: An Altmer Mage, Evangeline,  is currently taking up residence in Haelga\'s Bunkhouse in Riften, looking for someone to scoop her out of her terribly mundane life.
descriptionHtml:
-- Description -- 

An Altmer Mage, Evangeline,  is currently taking up residence in Haelga\'s Bunkhouse in Riften, looking for someone to scoop her out of her terribly mundane life.

She is fairly knowledgeable in conjuration and destruction and can cast fireball and summon storm atronachs among other things.

-- Requirements --

Apachii\'s Skyhair (Be sure to get the skyhairfemale file from the optional section)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Skyrim (duh!)

-- Recommended -- 

If you want her to look like she does in the screenshots, then you will need the following mods
Covereyes - eyes 3 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
Coverwomen - look 1 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563
The Eyebrows from Better Females http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812

-- Installation --

Unpack the .rar in the data folder of your Skyrim directory. When prompted to merge folders select yes.
Check the mod in the data files and enjoy! You can find her loitering about in Haelga\'s Bunkhouse in Riften; probably on the upper floors.

If you are going to use an optional file you must download the main file first then install as described above. Unpack the optional files .rar in the data folder and overwrite the .esp.

-- Credits --

Many thanks to all of the following modders and developers, without them, this mod would have never been possible!

Bellagail for Better Females
mrLenski for Covereyes and Coverwomen
apachii for Apachii\'s Skyhair
foretrenty for the Skyrim NPC Editor
Bethesda for Skyrim and their wonky modding tools
Anyone I may have forgotten (hopefully nobody).

-- Change Log --

v1.1
added more spells to her spell list
added an optional Assassin version. She is equipped with a leveled dagger and bow.
added an optional non essential option for both default and assassin versions

-----

Please report any bugs you can find to me as soon as possible. Suggestions are always welcome!
author: gen0
